scripts.build: npx json -I -f ./angular.json -e "this.projects.dip.architect.build.options.index='src/index.html'" && npx json -I -f ./src/manifest.json -e "this.scope='/'" && npx json -I -f ./src/manifest.json -e "this.start_url='/'" && npx ng build --prod --aot && npx json -I -f ./angular.json -e "this.projects.dip.architect.build.options.index='src/index.html'"
scripts.build-cognos: npx json -I -f .//angular.json -e "this.projects.dip.architect.build.options.index='src/index.cognos.html'" && npx json -I -f ./src/assets/cognos.json -e "this.debug=false" && npx json -I -f ./src/manifest.json -e "this.scope='/internal/bi/app/DIPRE/'" && npx json -I -f ./src/manifest.json -e "this.start_url='/internal/bi/app/DIPRE/'" && npx ng build --prod --aot && cd dist && rename index.cognos.html index.html && cd .. && npx json -I -f ./angular.json -e "this.projects.dip.architect.build.options.index='src/index.html'" && npx json -I -f ./src/assets/cognos.json -e "this.debug=true"
